mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worker(worker_type, customer_seq, name, email, phone_no, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, sex, worker_expert_type, academic_level, academic_level_val, start_work_year, start_work_month, sido, sigungu, detail_addr, register_ymdt, modify_ymdt) VALUES(#{workerType},#{customerSeq},#{name},#{email},#{phoneNo},#{birthYear},#{birthMonth},#{birthDay},#{sex} ,#{workerExpertType},#{academicLevel}, #{academicLevelVal},#{careerStartYear},#{careerStartMonth},#{sido},#{siGunGu},#{detailAddr},#{registerYmdt},#{modifyYmdt})

INSERT INTO worker_career(worker_seq, work_start_year, work_start_month, work_end_year, work_end_month, recruit_type, job_desc, company_name) VALUES(#{workerSeq}, #{workStartYear}, #{workStartMonth}, #{workEndYear}, #{workEndMonth}, #{recruitType}, #{jobDesc}, #{companyName})
INSERT INTO worker_advantage(worker_seq, advantage_seq, advantage_type, workmanship, workmanship_val) VALUES(#{workerSeq}, #{advantageSeq}, #{advantageType}, #{workmanship}, #{workmanshipVal})
